sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 如果方便的话，请告诉我。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rúguǒ fāngbiàn de huà, qǐng gàosu wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Si c'est pratique, veuillez me le dire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: If it's convenient, please let me know.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家公司负责货物的运输。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngsī fùzé huòwù de yùnshū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette entreprise est responsable du transport des marchandises.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This company is responsible for transporting goods.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì guójiā de yīngxióng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est un héros national.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a national hero.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zài zhèlǐ děnghòu jiàohào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez attendre ici qu'on appelle votre numéro.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please wait here for your number to be called.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā pāi le pāi wǒ de jiānbǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il m'a tapé sur l'épaule.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He patted my shoulder.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 经理交代我完成这项任务。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnglǐ jiāodài wǒ wánchéng zhè xiàng rènwu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le directeur m'a demandé d'accomplir cette tâche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The manager asked me to complete this task.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngsī de dàiyù hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette entreprise offre un bon traitement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This company offers good treatment.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Diànhuà zhànxiàn, qǐng shāohòu zài bō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La ligne est occupée, veuillez rappeler plus tard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The line is busy, please call back later.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yào bǎwò hǎo zhè cì jīhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois bien saisir cette opportunité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should seize this opportunity well.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè guīzé dōu yǒu lìwài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chaque règle a ses exceptions.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Every rule has exceptions.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bǎ tóufa rǎn chéng le hóngsè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle s'est teint les cheveux en rouge.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She dyed her hair red.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mùqián de júmiàn fēicháng fùzá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La situation actuelle est très complexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The current situation is very complex.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàjiā duì tā de píngjià hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde a une haute opinion de lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has a high opinion of him.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天天气晴朗，适合出游。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān tiānqì qínglǎng, shìhé chūyóu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps est clair aujourd'hui, idéal pour une sortie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather is clear today, suitable for an outing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yī tiáo hé héng chuān zhè zuò chéngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Une rivière traverse cette ville horizontalement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A river runs across this city.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de shǒujī xìnhào hěn ruò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le signal téléphonique est faible ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The phone signal is weak here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiǎohuǒzi hěn qínkuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce jeune homme est très travailleur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This young man is very hardworking.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这条街有很多特色小吃。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo jiē yǒu hěn duō tèsè xiǎochī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette rue a beaucoup de snacks locaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This street has many local snacks.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他手中握有很大的权力。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shǒuzhōng wò yǒu hěn dà de quánlì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il détient un grand pouvoir entre ses mains.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He holds great power in his hands.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè yǒuqù de huàtí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un sujet intéressant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an interesting topic.
